channel.description: Recent content in barf on Barefoot Rob

item.title: My computer locked up last night
item.description: 07:13 Friday 23 October 2015 JST I woke my computer from sleep, and it didn’t respond to any keypresses, either from its own keyboard or the USB keyboard. The mouse cursor wouldn’t move, using either the trackpad or USB mouse. The only key which worked was the power key. I pressed it for a while and the dialog boxed popped up: Are you sure you want to shut down the computer?
